sentences.en: Duff said he would be demanding a rematch.
He denies demanding money with menaces.
sentences.cn: 他否认有过勒索钱财的行为。

sentences.en: He found he could no longer cope with his demanding job.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己已无力应对那份劳神费力的工作了。

sentences.en: He found the rigours of the tour too demanding.
sentences.cn: 他发现这次旅行非常艰苦。

sentences.en: He was at my door night and day, demanding my attention.
sentences.cn: 他日日夜夜呆在我门口，想引起我的注意。

sentences.en: Health workers are angrily demanding higher pay.
sentences.cn: 医务人员正怒气冲冲地要求增加工资。

sentences.en: It is a sensuous but demanding car to drive.
sentences.cn: 这车坐上去很舒服，但需要高超的驾驶技术。

sentences.en: Prison officers are demanding pay parity with the police force.
sentences.cn: 狱警正要求与警察同工同酬。

sentences.en: Ricky was a very demanding child.
sentences.cn: 里基是个非常难伺候的孩子。

sentences.en: She is demanding reimbursement for medical and other expenses.
sentences.cn: 她正在索赔医药费和其他花费。

sentences.en: She was sacked for demanding Saturdays off.
sentences.cn: 她因为要求星期六不上班而被解雇了。

sentences.en: The director sailed in, demanding to know who had disobeyed his orders.
sentences.cn: 主任盛气凌人地走进来, 查问是谁违背了他的命令.

sentences.en: The envelope contained a typed, unsigned letter demanding £75,000 in cash.
sentences.cn: 信封里装着一封打印的、没签名的信，索要75,000英镑。

sentences.en: The people are demanding a chance to participate more in government.
sentences.cn: 人民要求更多的参与政事的机会.
这工作需要有很好的体力。

words.tran_cn: 苛求的；要求高的；吃力的

phrases.tran_cn: 消费需求；消费者的要求
国内需求；本地内部需求
能源需求；需能量；能量需要
受欢迎的；非常需要的；销路好；有需要
满足需要，满足要求；符合要求

trans.tran_cn: 费时的，劳神的，苛刻的，要求很高的
trans.tran_en: needing a lot of ability, effort, or skill
